author: eyang
msg: CHUKWA-705. Updated Chukwa to partially support JDK7 and updated to Hadoop 1.2.1 and HBase 0.96.1.1.  (Eric Yang)

author: mattsicker
msg: Make toByteArray static and add javadoc.

author: oheger
msg: XMLConfiguration no longer implements the EntityRegistry interface.
It is now expected that a fully initialized EntityResolver is passed to the
initialization parameters of a configuration builder.

author: oheger
msg: XMLConfiguration no longer implements the EntityResolver interface.
The resolveEntity() method has already been deprecated in the 1.x version.
Entities are now exclusively resolved by an external resolver.

author: oheger
msg: Added a subsection with builder parameters for XML configurations.
